page.title: 03LARKHILL ESTATE
page.content: I questioned my Mum about the difference between the Larkhill Estate 35 years ago and now. Larkhill Estate was mostly fields then.The Road was made up as far as Abbey Road and then petered out to just a lane. On the left hand side there was the only shop owned by a Mr.and Mrs.Collins. A little further up,a small estate of Prefabs were put up.These were still there 30 years later. The only buildings on the right hand side were a few very old cottages and also an old farm called{'Brakes Farm'} The farmer used to deliver the milk and people had to collect in jugs outside their homes.This farm fell derelict later.The housing estate is still growing,with industrial development to provide work.
